text:
As soon as the #COVID19
#vaccine was offered to me, I accepted. We have been treading water for nearly a year. This vaccine will help turn the tide on this pandemic. For the first time in months, I feel hopeful.

https://t.co/wqtfYDCtxs

#VaccinesWork #WearAMask #SocialDistancing https://t.co/mfRiWKCENx
